text: Fortified wine is wine that has had liquor mixed into it while it was fermenting. The added liquor means that the wine has more alcohol in it and a different flavor. ==History== Fortified wines became popular in Europe during the 1600s. ==Types== There are many popular types of fortified wine, including: * Sherry * Port wine * Vermouth * Madeira wine * Marsala wine ==References== Category:Wine
title: Fortified wine
